price: هغه لره دي څه چې په آسمانو، ځمكه، د دواړو تر منځه او لمدې خاورې نه لاندې دي.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wamā baynahumā wamā taḥta al-tharā
